William Callaghan

  1. Foster Name: William J. Keefe
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Billy
  3. Foster Family: Timothy and Mary Ann Keefe
  4. Location of Family: Elk City, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Elk City, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 23 mos.
  8. Date of Birth: 6/23/1910, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 2/18/1998, CA
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Madeline Keefe
  12. Source: Crossroads, Summer 1989, p. 8; Eloise Thomsen Orphan Train Register, 428; National Orphan Trian Complex; Patricia J. Young and Frances E.
